de.parsemis.miner.environment
Class LocalEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType>

java.lang.Object
  de.parsemis.miner.environment.LocalEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType>
Type Parameters:
NodeType - the type of the node labels (will be hashed and checked with .equals(..))
EdgeType - the type of the edge labels (will be hashed and checked with .equals(..))
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType>, Relabler<NodeType,EdgeType>, java.io.Serializable
public class LocalEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphEnvironment<NodeType,EdgeType>, Relabler<NodeType,EdgeType>, java.io.Serializable

This class is for locally storing all final settings, the database and the corresponding relabeling functions.

Author:
Marc Woerlein (woerlein@informatik.uni-erlangen.de)
See Also:
Serialized Form
